sect2.title: Bison Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib Coreutils: basename, cat, chmod, cp, dirname, echo, expr, head, hostname, install, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm, rmdir, sleep, tr, uname, uniq Diffutils: cmp Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Grep: egrep, fgrep, grep Make: make Sed: sed Texinfo: install-info
